protein.specific_function: Involved in the biosynthesis of L2/HNK-1 carbohydrate epitope on both glycolipids and glycoproteins (By similarity).

reference.reference_text: Marcos I, Galan JJ, Borrego S, Antinolo G: Cloning, characterization, and chromosome mapping of the human GlcAT-S gene. J Hum Genet. 2002;47(12):677-80.
